website_summaries.verdict: This double convection oven has all the bells and whistles in a compact and affordable package.
pros: This smaller double convection oven includes the same great technology as the larger version – quick pre-heating, even baking, delayed start, and built-in temperature probe
2 convection ovens offer lots of flexibility, but this unit is compact enough for  smaller kitchens
cons: No microwave, a loud beep, and a loud fan are the most common complaints

customer_reviews.title: no shipping damage beautiful oven and it fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We were very skeptical about buying this on line but after checking with appliance stores and other outlets and checking prices we decided to make this purchase. We were very surprised when it arrived at our front door, no shipping damage beautiful oven and it fit perfectly. I installed it in about 30 minutes My wife is a baker and she could not believe how well her baked goods turn out. This oven preheats in no time and is a pleasure to use. I would recommend this oven to anyone who is considering buying a new oven.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this unit on April 27th. It’s now June 25th and I still don’t have a working oven. Took 4 weeks to receive the item. Immediately installed the unit only to find it didn’t turn on. Had a professional electrician come out to confirm it was the device itself that doesn’t work, not the electrical hook-up. I’ve now been dealing with Frigidaire’s warranty service trying to get the unit fixed for the past 4 weeks. Many appointments set - resulting in No call no shows, showing up with the incorrect parts, etc. Overall terrible experience. I would not buy this unit or anything else from Frigidaire.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P.

customer_reviews.title: Great oven at bargain price.
customer_reviews.text: We love this oven! It arrived on time and in pristine condition. Being a double oven I enlisted a friend to help get it in position and we've been using it for a year now. No problems, easy to operate and the stainless steel still looks great. The cooling fans noise is the one thing that could be improved, they are on the loud side.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Love the Sleek Look of this Double Oven!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and very sleek! And, so far, more than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm very impressed with this oven. Whatever I bake it bakes quicker and better than my old oven. It's an attractive unit and fairly easy to clean so far.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Would buy a different one if it was possible
customer_reviews.text: Pros: looks great and works well Cons: takes a long time to get to desired temperature , makes a little too much noise after baking is done Ultimately we had size constraints and this was the only decent oven that fit the space we had.
customer_reviews.author: I R C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome CONVECTION oven for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome CONVECTION oven for the price! Also very modern, sleek and easy to install. The junction box is near the top of the oven making it too short for the electrical cable- had to use an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: it was great. We love the
customer_reviews.text: It came with a broken control panel, but the company sent us out a new one. Once it was installed, it was great. We love the oven
customer_reviews.author: Fair&Honest

customer_reviews.title: Works really good, heats up fast and very even heat
customer_reviews.text: Works really good, heats up fast and very even heat. My wife was bummed when our old trusty Viking's circuits fried, but now she admits this oven works way better.
customer_reviews.author: David Pate

customer_reviews.title: Review
customer_reviews.text: Temp needs adjusting. Exhaust fan noisy. Price good. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: William H. Blair

customer_reviews.title: Does great, easy install
customer_reviews.text: Does great, easy install, replaced out an 80s oven, so this was an economical upgrade. My only issue was I wish the electric harness was longer, but other than that, very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul andrews

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: Now it's been like three years since I bought this double stack oven; so far never hand an issue with it.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Raiss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price, speedy shipping, arrived undamaged, self installed in one hour.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Kasel

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Loving my new oven thus far. I cook about 4-5dys out of the week and so it's been put to good use since purchased, which is about a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanine Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Best value out there
customer_reviews.text: Everything showed up perfect. Power whip a little short is the only thing that could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Watterson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value and performs well so far. Easy to operate and get use to
customer_reviews.author: D Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great double oven!
customer_reviews.text: Best double oven for the price! Heats up quick, looks fantastic. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ProudMamaAndWife

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Oven works great, easy to install, just a really heavy so we took the doors off to install.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price, quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: Looks fantastic! Installed easily in our space with two strong guys. It's great to have two convection ovens. Not sure about longevity, though. Haven't yet run a clean cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Cognizant Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Oven
customer_reviews.text: The fan is NOT LOUD. IT IS AN EXCELLENT OVEN!
customer_reviews.author: Gladys C.

customer_reviews.title: This product was delivered to my house. I paid ...
customer_reviews.text: This product was delivered to my house. I paid an electrician to remove my old and install this one. The clock worked and that was it. Epic fail!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my new oven!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh I love this oven. It's very quiet and cooks perfectly. I have only had it for about two weeks but love it so much so far.
customer_reviews.author: Fullercd

customer_reviews.title: but the features are wonderful and it gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I have a small kitchen and my old microwave was a full sized microwave that took up a large amount of cabinet space and seemed out of place because of its size It is a bit larger than I expected, but it is very powerful. I haven't owned it for very long, but the features are wonderful and it gets the job done. Hard to beat for the price. Bought this for a temporary living situation and couldn't ask for more for the price. As an older person the only improvement would be larger buttons for the start/stop but that would add cost.
customer_reviews.author: Sven Jacobi

product_meta.title: Frigidaire FGET2765PF Gallery 27" Stainless Steel Electric Double Wall Oven - Convection
